summary: Reliable and customer-oriented retail professional with over 10 years of experience in sales support, sales and account management.

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) Business Administration and Economics

profile_positions.description: The mission of Design of Scandinavia is to sell high quality interior design products in the Benelux market. Design of Scandinavia develop own design/private label products for the set table and kitchen, either for a retail or advertising purpose.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Mariska Meijers is a Dutch design and lifestyle brand selling products B2B and B2C. Mariska has its brand store and designer's studio in the heart of Jordaan Amsterdam.
- Leading the day-to-day store operations as assistant store manager
- Responsible for the store budget
- Giving customers advice in the use of Mariska Meijers collection
- Introduced products increasing sales and profitability of the store
- Styling of store for an exciting customer store experience
profile_positions.title: Assistant Store Manager

profile_positions.description:
Delivered an 8-week consultancy assignment for the Dutch lifestyle brand Urban Nature Culture.
•	Researched, created and validated an extensive list of agents for the Norwegian interior design 
        market
•	Followed up sales opportunities to deliver more orders and sales
•	Formulated templates and translated customer sales communication into local language
profile_positions.title: Freelance Consultant

profile_positions.description:
At Opto Design, a Swedish interior design company, I provided remote and onsite sales support.
•	Represented Opto Design at International and domestic interior design fairs
•	Was in charge of customer quotations, customer orders, reclamations, (credit)invoices, updated 
         price-list, stock management, deliveries, transport documents for EU/Non EU/Worldwide 
         customers, agreements/purchase contracts, client payments, collection letters, maintenance 
         customer database, royalty and sales statistic reports
•	Handled the contact with agents and distributors in/outside EU and Worldwide (Scandinavia, USA, Hawaii, Japan and China)
profile_positions.title: Ad interim account and sales support manager

profile_positions.description:
IDA Foundation is a not-for-profit organization supplying medicines and medical supplies at a low price to low and medium income countries.

Sales Support Executive European Market

In my position at IDA I was an inside sales account manager for our key and potential key customers in Europe. I was responsible for all sales support activities including;

•	Producing and follow up quotations
•	Processing orders
•	Follow up orders until goods arrives at customer’s site
•	After sales service in order achieving/increasing customer satisfaction for Wholesale account
profile_positions.title: Inside Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
Cisco Systems, Inc. is the worldwide leader in networking for the Internet. Today, networks are an essential part of business, education, government and home communications, and Cisco's Internet Protocol-based (IP) networking solutions are the foundation of these networks. 
Cisco is the market leader in multiple areas, such as routing, switching, unified communications, wireless and security.

Inside Sales Account Manager Sweden (maternity leave position):

I was contracted by  Cisco as an Inside Sales Account Manager responsible for the Swedish commercial market.

•	I  managed my assigned territory, end customers in the retail market, via telephone to qualify potential customers and identify networking demands.
•	I managed to build strong relationships with customers on a short period of  time
•	I developed a close cooperation with all Cisco’s major partners  
•	I  implemented business strategies to achieve personal and Cisco targets
•	I closed orders over the phone
profile_positions.title: Inside Sales Account Manager (Maternity leave)

profile_positions.description:
Summerflower is included in Springflower Holding BV, one of the biggest exporters of pot plants, cut flowers and garden plants in Europe. Springflower Holding BV has a strong position in e.g. France, Germany, Holland, Spain and Italy and has recently started to build up a presence in Scandinavia and the Baltic states. The total turnover is 180 million Euro. Summerflower counts for 80% of the Springflower Holding turnover. Summerflower is very successful in contracting supermarket customers with special focus on hard discount supermarket chains.

Account Manager Scandinavia

I have worked for Summerflower as the Sales & Account Manager for the Scandinavian market. My tasks included;

•	Build up the Scandinavian market through acquisition sales mainly focusing on Sweden but also Denmark, Norway and Finland
•Do research on my target markets to evaluate the best selling assortment (own produced and imported), price levels, product quality, supply-chain of customers , competitors i.e.
•Target customers as supermarket chains, full service and hard discount. Secondary focus is garden centers and wholesalers.
•Prepare attractive and selling quotations. Call and meet customers for feedback on quotations and prospects for total co-operation.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager Scandinavia

profile_positions.description:
Demetech AB is a venture capital funded company which operates in the medical equipment industry. 
During the summer of 2004 the board of directors of Demetech decided to change the direction of the company. As a result of this decision, Demetech will now be putting its resources into R&D and work towards a partnership or merger with a multinational medical equipment company.

Sales & Account Manager Sweden:

I was contracted by Demetech as an Account & Sales Manager responsible for the Swedish market.

• I had the full responsibility for planning and executing marketing and sales activities in Sweden. 
• During 3 years I sold about 80 osteoporosis devices, price tag 250.000 SEK per unit (approximately 30.000 Euro), to pharmaceutical companies, hospitals and doctors in a growing and competitive market. I initiated a thorough sales leads program and it helped Demetech to penetrate the Swedish market and to find the most prospective buyers.
• Temporarily, during 9 months, I was responsible for the English market. I built a foundation for   our future activities in the country and it is now one of the most promising markets with a lot of future potential.
•I was responsible for the after sales process; installing the bone densitometry device and educating our customers to become professional users of the device. 
• I led clinical studies with a majority of the opinion leaders in osteoporosis to validate the technological advantage of our bone densitometry device.
profile_positions.title: Sales & Account manager Sweden

profile_positions.description:
GfK Sweden is the leading full service market research company in the country and part of GfK AG, Nuremberg, Germany, one of the world’s largest business groups for market studies. Worldwide it has 120 subsidiaries and offices with approximately 5.200 employees in 57 countries. GfK Sweden offers a full portfolio of market research methods with strong international connections. GfK Sweden’s clients encompass more than 1.000 companies, representing a wide span of industries (industry, retail, the service sector, the media, health care i.e.).

Sales & Account Manager

I was contracted as a Sales & Account Manager responsible for customized market research for Swedish customers for the domestic and international market. 

•I had full responsibility, client accounts and budget, for customized quantitative and qualitative market research for a variety of customers from different industries.
•During 1 ½ years I sold 10 extensive market research programs, each to a value of 50.000 – 100.000 SEK (approximately 5.500 – 11.000 Euro).
•Each program involved a lot of preparation and meetings with my clients. It implied; design of questionnaires, co-ordination of fieldwork, analysis and interpretation of results, composition of the final report and finally presentation of the results to the customers.
•Under challenging economical market conditions I managed to meet my budget targets and sustain and enlarge my customer portfolio.
profile_positions.title: Sales Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Pfizer, Animal Health, a division of the multinational company Pfizer, developed and marketed veterinary drugs and OTC products for markets worldwide. It was the one of the market leaders comprising drugs for both production animals and pets. Our product portfolio comprised about 100 drugs. The Swedish and Norwegian sales organization had a turnover of 60 MSEK in 1999 (approximately 7 MEuro) and 14 employees. 

In March 2000, the rights to market and sell Pfizer Animal Health drugs in Sweden and Norway were sold to Orion Pharma Animal Health in Finland.

Sales & Account Manager Veterinary Drugs, Region West Sweden:

I was contracted as a sales and account manager responsible for the sales of veterinary drugs in the western part of Sweden. 

• I had full responsibility, consisting of sales budget and targets, for over 200 customers, including veterinaries, nurses, pharmacies and farmers. 
• On a yearly basis I sold for approximately 10 MSEK (approximately 1.1 MEuro). 
• Through pro-active sales work, including seminars, workshops and tradeshows I managed to convince existing and new clients about the advantages of using Pfizer Animal drugs. I worked successfully by influencing customer decision makers to expand the use of our drugs to treat more symptoms and diseases. These actions effectively increased our sales.
profile_positions.title: Sales & Account Manager Veterinary Drugs, Region West Sweden
